page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE SURVEY 2
page.content:
The second part of the survey asked about leisure activities. Gardening is the most popular hobby. Most adults like listening to classical music while children prefer pop music. For people who do active sports most do football and cricket. These are also popular spectator sports. Those who have computers usually use them for playing games. Regarding TV the survey found that children liked films while adults liked documentaries best. Sports programmes were popular as well.
Other facts showed that most families never went to church. Most took holidays in Britain. Most shopped in supermarkets. The Glossop Chronicle was the most popular paper with the Mirror heading the national press.
